## Experiment

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

compute_group_xy_means <- function(data, scales){
  
  data |>
    summarise(x = mean(x),
              y = mean(y),
              label = paste0("(", round(x),",", (round(y)), ")"))
  
}

StatXymeans <- ggproto("StatXymeans", 
                       Stat,
                       compute_group = compute_group_xy_means)

ggplot(cars) +
  aes(speed, dist) + 
  geom_point() + 
  layer(stat = StatXymeans,
        geom = GeomText,
        position = "identity",
        params = list(nudge_x = .2, color = "red") ## Warning: Ignoring unknown parameters: `nudge_x`
        )
```
